official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to give shareholders the right to use cumulative voting in the elections of directors of bank holding companies.

summary.text: Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to give shareholders the right to use cumulative voting in the election of directors of bank holding companies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to give shareholders the right to use cumulative voting in the elections of directors of bank holding companies.
